call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - November 6th

commitments.commitment: AI game Sigma Quest starts this weekend, Sunday morning
commitments.quote: We even have an AI game coming up this weekend. Tim Erg's AI game Sigma Quest starts this weekend, Sunday morning.

commitments.commitment: First pull request got into the Explorer backend repository for maintenance work and bug fixes
commitments.quote: Infrastructure-wise, we need to do some maintenance work and bug fix for Explorer. Well, the first pull request just got in the Explorer backend repository.

commitments.commitment: Launch Dev Nets for sub blocks in a few days
commitments.quote: And for sub blocks. We are going to launch Dev Nets in a few days, now bigger.

commitments.commitment: Start two weeks marketing campaign for CLB event once technical part is sorted
commitments.quote: So as soon as we know this we will start probably two weeks marketing campaign.

commitments.commitment: Will be posting updates with USE Twitter account specifically dedicated to the stable coin
commitments.quote: How can you help at the moment? Just attend spaces and subscribe to my Twitter, USE Twitter account. So it's there. I'll be posting some updates with my USE account on Twitter, specifically dedicated to this stable coin.

commitments.commitment: Bitcoin Runes development deployment procedure hoped to start by next week
commitments.quote: They hope to finish important ones and start Bitcoin Runes development deployment procedure. Awesome, by next week.

open_questions.question: Looking for maintainers of Ergo Wallet to update Android SDK and publish new versions
open_questions.context: Need to update wallet infrastructure and consider future wallet designs with AI agents

open_questions.question: Need to find ways to publish MHS monitor mobile wallets and add multi-sig support to ergo wallet
open_questions.context: MHS monitor supports multi-sig and is quite amazing but needs publishing

open_questions.question: Waiting for kushti to give go ahead that technical part is clear for USE protocol launch
open_questions.context: All preparations are ready but need technical confirmation before proceeding

key_facts.fact: Sigma Quest game currently contains 200 ERG, everybody who participates has to kick in 20 ERG, 15 of which goes into the pot
key_facts.speaker: Grayman

key_facts.fact: Infrastructure historically paid for by the EF, there was a billing issue with Hetzner midweek or end of last week
key_facts.speaker: qx

key_facts.fact: Only 100 CLB tokens will be minted with nine decimals
key_facts.speaker: Richi

key_facts.fact: Goal is to collect around 300,000 to 400,000 ERG for the bootstrap
key_facts.speaker: Richi

key_facts.fact: Liquidity pool is bootstrapped with 0.3% fee
key_facts.speaker: Richi

key_facts.fact: Bonus airdrops expected to be about between 5 to 10% of the value of contribution
key_facts.speaker: Richi

key_facts.fact: CLB event planned to run for three days
key_facts.speaker: Richi

key_facts.fact: Last time checked, only 2% of Zcash total supply was shielded
key_facts.speaker: kushti
